question: There are 124 fourth-graders at Oak Ridge School. 77 of them are girls. On Monday, 8 fourth-grade girls and 9 fourth-grade boys were absent. How many fourth grade boys were at Oak Ridge School on Monday?
answer:
Of the 124 fourth graders, 77 are girls, so 124 students - 77 girls = <<124-77=47>>47 boys.
On Monday there were 47 boys - 9 absent = <<47-9=38>>38 boys.
#### 38
